question: 拡大
sourceMnemonic: <kanji>Extend</kanji> the lens nice and <kanji>big</kanji> to <vocabulary>zoom</vocabulary> in on the subject, please. That's <vocabulary>magnification</vocabulary>, <vocabulary>enlargement</vocabulary>, and <vocabulary>expansion</vocabulary>.
sourceReadingMnemonic: This is a jukugo word that uses the on'yomi readings of the kanji. You should be able to read this on your own.
